name: BibleFacts

”Alexa, open bible facts”
”Alexa, start bible facts”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible facts
des: The Bible is a collection of sacred texts or scriptures that Jews and Christians consider to be a product of divine inspiration and a record of the relationship between God and humans. Learn more about bible in these facts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
